name: Choupyramid
description:
Description: Steve Jones went inside the wrong pyramid this time. He will have to overcome three trials to succeed his quest and comeback to present...

Limitation: This game is about relief contrast. The main character is colourful, well animated and 3D-like, while the background and interactables are slow pasted, monochromatic and plane.

Help in game:
Try right click, use your mouse, A & D keys or arrow keys
